data.title: Dell and Lenovo
data.meta_description: Dell And Lenovo (2) - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a project report submitted by Anmol Agarwal to fulfill the requirements for a Bachelor of Business Administration degree from Invertis University. The report compares Dell and Lenovo based on the 4Ps of marketing - product, price, place, and promotion. It includes an introduction to Dell and Lenovo, literature review, comparison analysis between the two companies, their market shares, findings, conclusions, limitations, and recommendations. The objective is to study the marketing strategies, SWOT analysis, and product features comparison of Dell and Lenovo. Secondary data sources include the companies' websites.
